title.rendered: Apply for University Of Canberra Scholarship for International High Achiever 2024

content.rendered:
The University Of Canberra International High Achiever Scholarship, Eligibility, List of Available Courses, and How to Apply are listed below.

The University Of Canberra International High Achiever Scholarship

The University Of Canberra International High Achiever Scholarship is awarded to new students, Bachelor, or Master’s Degree for admission to a UC Bachelor’s or Master’s degree coursework at the university.

Table of contents

The University Of Canberra International High Achiever Scholarship

Eligibility for International High Achiever Scholarship

How to Apply for the Scholarship

List of Courses Offered at the University of Canberra, Australia

A summary of the Scholarship is given below;

  • Degree: Bachelor, Masters
  • Awarded by:               University of Canberra
  • Deadline:                   Open for Application (Varying deadlines)
  • Scholarship value:     Partial Funding, 20% of Tuition fees
  • Eligibility:                  All nationalist (International Students)

Eligibility for International High Achiever Scholarship

  • Any citizenship
  • Bachelor and Master by coursework
  • Commencing
  • Bachelor Degree
  • Master degree
  • GPA 6 out of 7
  • 85% or higher for Undergraduate Degree
  • 80% or higher for a Masters’s degree
  • Full-time student
  • Offshore
  • Onshore
  • Bruce students only
  • Articulation and Sponsored students not eligible
  • Diplomatic students not eligible

Note:

  • Articulation and Sponsored students not eligible
  • Diplomatic students not eligible

Value: Successful applicants will receive 20% off the total tuition fees.

How to Apply for the Scholarship

  • Go to the University Of Canberra Application Portal
  • Select Student Type (Domestic, International, Research)
  • Click Apply through University Online Application Portal
  • Click on Register (New User) or Login (Returning User)
  • Provide accurate information
  • Upload documents where necessary
  • Submit

List of Courses Offered at the University of Canberra, Australia

Bachelor and Master by coursework

  • Bachelor of Engineering in Network and Software Engineering (Honours)

Bachelor by coursework

  • Master of Law
  • Bachelor of Building and Construction Management
  • Bachelor of Design (Interaction Design)
  • Bachelor of Science
  • Bachelor of Arts (Digital Media)
  • Master of Human Resources Management
  • Bachelor of Sports and Exercise Science
  • Bachelor of Health Science (Human Movement)
  • Master of Marketing Management
  • Bachelor of Biomedical Science
  • Bachelor of Business (International Business)
  • Bachelor of Communication and Media (Corporate and Public Communication)
